input: goal: How can I sterilize a wound? [SEP] solution 1If the wound is clean or infected, washing in regular salt water can help irrigate and disinfect it [SEP] solution 2If the wound is dirty or infected, washing in regular salt water can help irrigate and disinfect it

goal: To obtain a cutting from a living plant, you can [SEP] solution 1Use a razor blade at a downward angle to get a cutting from a plant [SEP] solution 2Use a miter saw at a downward angle to get a cutting from a plant
goal: How can I organize fishing lures? [SEP] solution 1Cut an empty egg carton in half and use the top. [SEP] solution 2Cut an empty egg carton in half and use the bottom.

goal: Make coconut flavor hot chocolate. [SEP] solution 1Add one table spoon of drinking chocolate to a mug of warm coconut oil. [SEP] solution 2Add one table spoon of drinking chocolate to a mug of warm milk, then mix in one table spoon of coconut oil.
goal: Safeguard coffee table for kids. [SEP] solution 1Wrap pasta noodle around table edges. [SEP] solution 2Wrap pool noodle around table edges.

goal: How to glue inlays to neck of ukulele. [SEP] solution 1Using superglue, glue each inlay in the space you have marked for the neck of the ukulele. Wait to dry. [SEP] solution 2Using glitter glue, glue each inlay in the space you have marked for the neck of the ukulele. Wait to dry.
goal: How to I get leaves in my yard into a pile? [SEP] solution 1Take a shovel and rake the leaves together into a pile. [SEP] solution 2Take a rake and rake the leaves together into a pile.
goal: To bend a metal rod precisely to make a hinge. [SEP] solution 1Use a hammer to bend the rod. [SEP] solution 2Use pliers to bend the rod.
goal: how do you pour liquid? [SEP] solution 1fill another container with it. [SEP] solution 2throw it into another container.
goal: sledgehammer [SEP] solution 1can knock in a wedge with a narrow head [SEP] solution 2can knock in a nail with a narrow head

goal: What materials are needed to make a Spiderman mask/ [SEP] solution 11. Cardboard        2. goal: Keep fridge smelling fresh. [SEP] solution 1Put coffee grounds into empty container with holes. [SEP] solution 2Put coffee in a mug.
goal: telescope [SEP] solution 1can be covered in plastic wrap  [SEP] solution 2can be covered in screwdriver
goal: floss [SEP] solution 1helps keep teeth clean [SEP] solution 2helps keep nails clean
goal: Remove stems from strawberries. [SEP] solution 1Push a straw through center of strawberry. [SEP] solution 2Push a knife through center of strawberry.
goal: How long should I make a magic wand? [SEP] solution 1A magic wand should be about 32 centimeters in length. [SEP] solution 2A magic wand should be about 32 inches in length.
